message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. I know it's a valuable item and I believe this price reflects its worth. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I can only afford to pay up to $9,500. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still looking for a price closer to my asking price. I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is a fair price for both of us, and I believe it reflects the value of the product.
Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. I appreciate it. I would like to counter with $10,000 for the product. I hope this helps us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
